action_items.task: First build Q1 KRs and from that make the initiatives for 2026 OKRs
Create wireframes and smoke test set up for 2WM
Speak to David about 2WM timing
Check in with Daniel on Jay and Eric

Make introduction to IXI team on monetization strategies shadowing
Start PA interview process
Creating pitch for influencer marketplace

decisions.what: Spur approved as supplier for competitive analysis flows
decisions.context: Received approval from Finance on Dec 4, 2025

decisions.what: TPT approval for legal checkbox only for California, based on zip code not State
decisions.context: Legal checkbox implementation - 3 SPs involved

decisions.what: 2WM pricing model similar to Wayfair - base price from 3rd party supplier with margin on top
decisions.context: Third party keeps inventory and owns logistics, HF charges margin to customers

decisions.what: Customer-centric, smaller KRs which are not only business-focused for 2026 OKRs
decisions.context: Should be framed in customer benefits, start from customer problem into business metrics

feedback: PDP plan review on Aug 14, 2025 - discussing gaps to fill for path to promotion
Career Pathing plan discussed on Feb 21, 2025
Personal Development Plan 2025 reviewed with focus on career progression

blockers.issue: Ahmed doing investigation on what's cheaper for checkout migration, needs support from Alex
Big concern from Evan is no strong BC; WBD want for throughout March to April
How do we compensate for tactical-bias
Should a C@C paid box ever have a status of cancelled in OWL

action_items.task: Ask about reusing backend services for HelloFresh
Create document to loop in Shay and detail AL planning for charge checkout at scale
Document all charge checkout issues including refund options via AL (orders tab vs error reporting)
Conduct live test and process via Bob to understand correct sequence for pre-cutoff orders
Send sheet documenting flow of order states, payment states, and AL actions
Start PA interview process
Complete GoC H1 2026 Product Prioritization (WIP)
Build Q1 KRs and derive initiatives from them
Create wireframes and smoke test setup for 2WM
Speak to David about 2WM timing

decisions.what: App-first approach for new features like merchandising tiles on Ellesium
decisions.context: Code reuse between web and mobile requires features to be built in specific way; all backend logic should be reusable

decisions.what: Cancel/refund functionalities during AL migration - performing one action makes other unavailable
decisions.context: Addressing confusion around charge checkout issues

decisions.what: Spur approved as supplier by Finance for competitive analysis flows
decisions.context: Agent use case for competitive analysis

decisions.what: C@C paid box status handling in OWL
decisions.context: Discussion on whether cancelled status should appear

decisions.what: 2026 OKRs approach: customer-centric, smaller KRs not only business-focused
decisions.context: Connect KRs with business OKRs (CVR, AOR) while tying customer benefit into business value

decisions.what: 3 KRs for Good Chop with potential QoQ variations, framed in customer benefits
decisions.context: Start from customer problem into business metrics

decisions.what: Charge at checkout: migrating to UPL (project lego) - component-driven payment layout
decisions.context: Would require building non-supported use cases (e.g. TB, cadences); Ahmed investigating cost with Alex support

decisions.what: TPT approval for legal checkbox only for California, based on zip code not State
decisions.context: Zip code is source of truth; 3 SPs involved

decisions.what: 2WM pricing model similar to Wayfair - base price from 3rd party supplier with margin on top
decisions.context: Supplier keeps inventory and owns logistics; need wireframes for SteerCo

feedback.context: Discussed gaps to fill for path to promotion
Filtering research method, monetization strategies, OTP deliveries API

blockers.issue: Confusion around charge checkout flows for AL - cancel/refund functionality unclear
Documentation needed for expected AL behavior despite current workarounds with Bob
Ahmed needs support from Alex for charge at checkout investigation
No strong business case from Evan; WBD want throughout March to April

key_topics: Code reuse between frontend and backend
